resources.string: Oh my! It seems our museum has a <donationName> on exhibit already!
I'll just return this to you.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
I have another donation.
Thats all!
Oh? What else have you got?
Thank you again, <PlayerName>.
Many thanks, <PlayerName>.
Thank you, <PlayerName>.
<shy>I would shake your hand in thanks, but that might be inappropriate.
Instead, I will give you this.
That's one of our empty frames. It's a shame no one has donated a photo to place in it.
That's one of our empty frames.
Oh! Do you have a photo we could put here?
Yes!
No.
Great! Show me what you want to place here.
Well, if you take a great photo you want to show off. Please bring it in!
Oh! What a wonderful photo that is!
I'm quite fond of it to be honest! <haha>
Oh! What a wonderful photo that is!
If you have another photo to you want to place here let me know!
I have a different photo!
No thanks.
Great! We're always looking for new exhibits.
Phew. I'm quite fond of this one.
<worried>Oh, sorry.
<shy>I don't think I introduced myself... I get a bit carried away sometimes.
<proud>I’m <myName>.
<glee>I'd love to open a museum here on <IslandName>.
We could fill it with all the interesting things found here on <IslandName>!
So please speak to <NPCName> about building the museum as soon as possible!
I think I’m going to write a paper about <IslandDay> and why it’s so good.
<thinking>Maybe that’s the surprise <NPCName> has for us tonight!
<glee>Everyone gets to write an essay!
Oh, G’day <PlayerName>.
<no>I’m not even going to step foot into the Museum today.
<shy>I’ve been told to relax and take it easy for <IslandDay>.
Oh my!
The sky!
<yes>It’s absolutely incredible.
I’ve never seen something so amazing.
Are you seeing this, <PlayerName>?
<NPCName> has outdone herself.
<yes>This is the best <Snag> I’ve ever had.
Part of me wants to put what’s left of my <Snag> into an exhibit, just to save it for later.
<haha>But it’s too tasty.
Hmmmm... The museum isn't really looking for this kind of thing.
Our collection include, fish, bugs and relics. If there are any other items you don't want, maybe consider selling them?
Thanks!
<shocked>Oh my!
<shy>I see you have quite a few new amazing specimens not yet in our museum!
Would you be willing to donate all of these?
Take them!
Actually...
<glee>Your generosity is outstanding!
Please accept <donationReward> as a small token of our gratitude!
Oh, I'll give these back then.
If you change your mind, don't hesitate to come back.
<shocked>Oh my!
<shy>I see you have quite a few new amazing specimens not yet in our museum!
Would you be willing to donate all of these?
Take them!
Actually...
<glee>Your generosity is outstanding!
I only require one of each specimen, so I’ll return these other ones to you.
Please accept <donationReward> as a small token of our gratitude!
Oh, I'll give these back then.
If you change your mind, don't hesitate to come back.
Welcome to the museum!
What can I do for you?
I have a donation.
I want to chat.
Nevermind.
OH! What have you brought me?
Please, have a look around.
Oh, nothing to donate then? That's fine!
<sigh>Although you did get my hopes up...
Oh, that's an empty frame.
<glee>We actually encourage locals to donate their own photos to display here!
Oh! What a wonderful photo that is!
The photographer is very talented!
<thinking>Museums are very important for society.
Imagine if we just kept all the old stuff where we found it?
<worried>It would be all over the place!
<shocked>Chaos!
<yes>I’ve really been enjoying documenting all the new species on this island.
<glee>To tell you the truth though, filing the documentation is nearly as enjoyable!
<worried>Fish and bugs are very interesting, but I really don't like touching either...
<yes>That’s fine though.
<proud>After all, things in a museum are for looking at, not touching.
<thinking>I’ve been wondering if there could be a way to catalogue air?
Would you be interested in seeing an air exhibit, <PlayerName>?
Oh yeah!
Not Really
<glee> See, I had a feeling you were a fellow air-head!
I’ll ask around town and see if I can find some more people who are interested! <glee>
<sigh> \nAh, that’s a shame. I’ve already collected a bunch of specimens in some jars...
<thinking>Paperwork can be very time consuming.
<haha>But they say time flies when you are having fun!
<yes>If you ever take a great photo and you want to show it off, please come and display it in the museum.
<yes>Don't worry, I will fill out the required forms for you!
<glee>It would be my absolute pleasure!
<proud>It’s so great to have a one stop shop to look at all the interesting stuff around here.
What?
<shocked>John’s Goods?
<no>No, no, no.
<angry>I meant the museum!
<glee>There are so many new species to study here on <IslandName>!
<worried> Oh no!
<no>I don’t mean I’m going to cut them open!
<proud>Here at the <IslandName> museum we only study by observing!
<thinking>Imagine if we could take everything on <IslandName> and put it in a museum!
<proud>That way, when people wanted to see a certain thing, they could just make their way to that wing!
Studying things is just my job.
<yes>I have plenty of other hobbies.
<glee>For example, in my spare time I like to talk about all the things I’ve been studying.
<thinking>I think one day we’ll see a Museum of Museums.
<yes>Truly the pinnacle of society.
All that knowledge, all those exhibits, all that paperwork!
<glee>So beautiful.
<thinking>I'd love to experience some more travelling one day.
<no>As long as I don't have to actually go anywhere else, of course.
<pumped>We could get exhibits from all over the world, and bring them right to <IslandName>!
<no>I don’t go outside too much.
<worried>There’s not enough order out there so it can get a bit overwhelming.
<worried>All the plants and people and animals are just going around doing whatever they want, all over the place!
<shocked>Chaos!
<thinking>There’s so many different ways to organise things and group them together.
<yes>Playing around with them can be exciting.
<pumped>Sometimes I’ll go around and rearrange everything alphabetically, then by height, and sometimes even by smell!
<yes>That last one is really easy to do, because everything smells like disinfectant, like it should.
<shy>Sometimes I like to climb into an empty case and pretend I’M the exhibit.
<haha>I’m a perfect candidate too, because I never try and escape.
<shy>Sometimes I stand really really still and pretend I’m a statue...
<haha>It makes me feel marble-ous!
Just a little museum humour for you, <PlayerName>.
<thinking>It must be nice to be getting watched all day.
<worried>I don’t think I could handle the attention though.
<thinking>Though, maybe if people formed an orderly queue it wouldn’t freak me out so much?
<yes>I’m a huge fan of music.
<no>I don’t listen to it, of course, it’s far too noisy.
But there’s so many different ways to catalogue and arrange it.
<thinking>You can organise by artist, genre, length, beats per minute…
<glee>So many possibilities!
<glee>What a beautiful day it is!
<yes>Perfect weather to be indoors and studying!
<glee>I just love the smell of fresh paper.
<yes>All neatly arranged, lined up and ready for work.
<pumped>Sometimes I feel bad writing on it, but we're doing really important work here.
<yes>So its all worth it!
What’s the point of anything happening if nobody is there to record it?
<yes>Hey, <PlayerName>, if a tree falls in the woods, please be sure to let me know.
Thank you! It looks great up here doesn't it?
<shocked>Oh my! A <donationName>!
<shy>Our collection is currently missing a <donationName>.
Would you be willing to donate it?
Take it!
Actually...
<glee>Your generosity is outstanding!
Please accept <donationReward> as a small token of our gratitude!
Oh, I'll give this back then.
If you change your mind, don't hesitate to come back.
<yes>Hello, <PlayerName>.
How is your <PaperLantern> hunt going?
<shy>I can’t say that I’ve hit any down as of yet.
<shy>To be honest I’m a bit concerned that <itemName> might fall on my head…
Greetings, <PlayerName>.
I’m not in the Museum today, no.
I thought it might be nice to join in on the <SkyFest> celebrations instead.
<shy>However, I do wish we could celebrate inside…
<pumped>This is incredible!
<glee>I guess it was well worth going outside for <SkyFest>!
<thinking>I do worry how the museum is fairing without me..
<yes>But I guess I should be focusing on this <Aurora>!
<yes>Yes I have my <Kite> already.
<yes>I decided to use my <Kite> from last year.
<shy>That way I wasn’t required to share any of the equipment.
<shy>I just prefer to not share things like that.
<glee>I don’t often receive <birthday> gifts, so this one is very appreciated.
I reckon we should catalogue them all.
Sea shells?
Yes. So they’re not all over the beach willy-nilly.
I miss standing at my desk.
You did that all day.
Not all day.
I miss standing at my desk.
You did that all day.
Not all day.
Do you think the museum is still nice and organised?
I’m sure it’s fine.
Maybe I should quickly go and check?
NO! Stay here, it’s fine.
My fish are going crazy!
Why is that?
They know it’s raining.
But what if the museum floods?
It’s not that much rain, mate.
We could fill it with all the interesting things found here on <IslandName>!
So please speak to Fletch about building the museum as soon as possible!
